name: Operation Pegasus (JoshDavidsonDev)
description:
Disclaimer: I do not own the rights to any of the asset models to music seen in this game and have only been used for non-commercial use, educational use, and personal use

Operation Pegasus is a tactical first-person shooter that will push you to your limits as a special force operative through three trial situations. You will learn new skills and develop them as you progress, earning XP to level up. 

This was a project I worked on in my first year of University that allowed me to teach myself the core fundamentals of game design. I hope you have fun and enjoy the prototype; it still has various bugs, but if you have any feedback, drop it into the comments, and I'll get back to you.
